de: Located in the arrival station of the famous Mastrou, the Tourist Office team welcomes you, between meadows, rivers and chestnut groves, in the heart of the Doux valley in the Ardèche. Not to be missed: the famous markets on Tuesdays and Saturdays in Lamastre.
ru: Located in the arrival station of the famous Mastrou, the Tourist Office team welcomes you, between meadows, rivers and chestnut groves, in the heart of the Doux valley in the Ardèche. Not to be missed: the famous markets on Tuesdays and Saturdays in Lamastre.
en: Located in the arrival station of the famous Mastrou, the Tourist Office team welcomes you, between meadows, rivers and chestnut groves, in the heart of the Doux valley in the Ardèche. Not to be missed: the famous markets on Tuesdays and Saturdays in Lamastre.
it: Located in the arrival station of the famous Mastrou, the Tourist Office team welcomes you, between meadows, rivers and chestnut groves, in the heart of the Doux valley in the Ardèche. Not to be missed: the famous markets on Tuesdays and Saturdays in Lamastre.
fr: Située en gare d'arrivée du célèbre Mastrou, l'équipe de l'Office de Tourisme vous accueille, entre prairies, rivières et châtaigneraies, au cœur de la vallée du Doux en Ardèche. A ne pas manquer : les célèbres marchés les mardis et samedis à Lamastre.
zh: Located in the arrival station of the famous Mastrou, the Tourist Office team welcomes you, between meadows, rivers and chestnut groves, in the heart of the Doux valley in the Ardèche. Not to be missed: the famous markets on Tuesdays and Saturdays in Lamastre.
es: Located in the arrival station of the famous Mastrou, the Tourist Office team welcomes you, between meadows, rivers and chestnut groves, in the heart of the Doux valley in the Ardèche. Not to be missed: the famous markets on Tuesdays and Saturdays in Lamastre.
nl: Gelegen in het aankomststation van de beroemde Mastrou, verwelkomt het team van het Toeristisch Bureau u, tussen weiden, rivieren en kastanjebossen, in het hart van de Doux vallei in de Ardèche. Niet te missen: de beroemde markten op dinsdag en zaterdag in Lamastre.

de: "Pays de Lamastre" Tourism board - Lamastre branch

nl: "Pays de Lamastre" Toeristische dienst - Filiaal van Lamastre

de: Derzeit sind unsere Räumlichkeiten von Dienstag bis Samstag von 10:00 bis 12:30 Uhr und von 14:00 bis 17:00 Uhr geöffnet, außer an Feiertagen.  Wir haben Maßnahmen für einen sicheren Empfang ergriffen: Das Tragen von Mundschutz ist Pflicht, nur eine Person darf das Tourismusbüro betreten, die Auslagen werden nicht berührt und wir bedienen die Gäste.
en: At present our premises are open from Tuesday to Saturday from 10am to 12.30pm and from 2pm to 5pm, excluding public holidays.  We have taken measures for a safe reception: wearing a mask is compulsory, only one person enters the Tourist Office, we do not touch the displays, we serve.
it: Attualmente i nostri locali sono aperti dal martedì al sabato dalle 10 alle 12.30 e dalle 14 alle 17, esclusi i giorni festivi.  Abbiamo adottato misure per un'accoglienza sicura: indossare una maschera è obbligatorio, solo una persona entra nell'Ufficio del Turismo, non tocchiamo gli espositori, siamo noi a servire.
fr: Actuellement nos locaux sont ouverts du mardi au samedi de 10h à 12h30 et de 14h à 17h hors jours fériés.  Nous avons pris des mesures pour un accueil en toute sécurité: port du masque obligatoire, une seule personne entre dans l'Office de Tourisme, on ne touche pas les présentoirs, c'est nous qui servons.
nl: Momenteel zijn onze lokalen geopend van dinsdag tot en met zaterdag van 10.00 tot 12.30 uur en van 14.00 tot 17.00 uur, met uitzondering van feestdagen.  Wij hebben maatregelen genomen voor een veilige ontvangst: het dragen van een masker is verplicht, slechts één persoon komt het VVV-kantoor binnen, wij raken de displays niet aan, wij bedienen.
es: Actualmente nuestros locales están abiertos de martes a sábado de 10 a 12.30 y de 14 a 17 horas, excepto los días festivos.  Hemos tomado medidas para una recepción segura: llevar una máscara es obligatorio, sólo entra una persona en la Oficina de Turismo, no tocamos los expositores, somos nosotros los que servimos.
